title: Bug 134949 - Themes nest in other library
description:
Bug 134949 - Themes nest in other library

Details:
Themes nest in other library

Steps to reproduce:
1. Library A uses Library B, and Library B has a themes.
2. Report design uses Library A.
3. Open the Library tree of A in library explorer and drop the themes from B into the layout.

Expected behavior:
Themes from Library B should be able to be successfully dropped into the layout in Library A.

Actual behavior:
An error message pops up, indicating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.

Exceptional result:
I am unsure if I can use this method for nesting themes from one library into another.
